00058 #include <avr/sfr_defs.h>
00059 #include "nartos.h"
00060 
00061 #define TRUE 1
00062 #define FALSE 0
00063 
00064 /* Global variables */
00065 
00066 static volatile uint8_t taskBufferOutPointer;  
00067 static volatile uint8_t taskBufferSize;        
00068 #ifdef PRIORITY_QUEUE
00069 static volatile uint8_t taskBufferPrioritySize;
00070 #endif
00071 static volatile uint16_t taskBuffer[queueLength];
00072 static volatile uint16_t taskTable[queueLength];
00073 static volatile uint8_t currentTaskID;  
00075 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00078 void initNartos(void)
00079 {
00080   volatile uint16_t *taskTablePointer;
00081   taskTablePointer = &taskTable[0];
00082   for (uint8_t index = 0; index < queueLength; ++index)
00083     *(taskTablePointer++) = 0x0000;
00084   taskBufferOutPointer = 0;
00085   taskBufferSize = 0;
00086 #ifdef PRIORITY_QUEUE
00087   taskBufferPrioritySize = 0;
00088 #endif
00089 }
00090 
00091 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00103 uint8_t taskStart(const uint16_t address, const uint8_t isr)
00104 {
00105 // Search the task table for an empty slot (contents = 0x0000)
00106   uint8_t taskID = 0;
00107   volatile uint16_t* taskTablePointer = &taskTable[0];
00108   asm("cli\n\t"::);
00109   while ((*taskTablePointer != 0) && (taskID < queueLength))
00110   {
00111     ++taskTablePointer;
00112     ++taskID;
00113   }
00114 // Put the task address in the taskTable, if there is room
00115   if (*taskTablePointer == 0)
00116   {
00117     *taskTablePointer = address;
00118 // Put the task ID on the queue to be executed, if there is room
00119     taskSchedule(taskID,isr);
00120   }
00121   else taskID = 0xFF;       // Full up, no action taken
00122   return taskID;
00123 }
00124 
00125 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00133 void taskRelinquish(void)
00134 {
00135   uint8_t addressHigh, addressLow;
00136   asm( "pop %0\n\t"
00137        "pop %1\n\t"
00138        "cli\n\t"
00139        :"=r" (addressHigh),"=r" (addressLow):);
00140   taskTable[currentTaskID] = (uint16_t) (addressHigh << 8) +
00141                              (uint16_t) addressLow;
00142   taskSchedule(currentTaskID,FALSE);
00143   nartos();
00144 }
00145 
00146 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00153 void taskExit(void)
00154 {
00155   asm( "pop __tmp_reg__\n\t"
00156        "pop __tmp_reg__\n\t"
00157        "cli\n\t"::);
00158   taskTable[currentTaskID] = 0x0000;
00159   nartos();
00160 }
00161 
00162 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00170 void taskWait(void)
00171 {
00172   uint8_t addressHigh, addressLow;
00173   asm( "pop %0\n\t"
00174        "pop %1\n\t"
00175        "cli\n\t"
00176        :"=r" (addressHigh),"=r" (addressLow):);
00177   taskTable[currentTaskID] = (uint16_t) (addressHigh << 8) +
00178                              (uint16_t) addressLow;
00179   nartos();
00180 }
00181 
00182 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00197 void taskSchedule(const uint8_t taskID, const uint8_t isr)
00198 {
00199   asm("cli\n\t"::);
00200   if (taskBufferSize < queueLength)
00201   {
00202     uint8_t taskBufferInPointer;
00203 #ifdef PRIORITY_QUEUE
00204     if (taskID & _BV(7))     /* Bit 7 indicates it is a priority task */
00205     {
00206       taskBufferInPointer = taskBufferOutPointer + queueLength -
00207                             taskBufferPrioritySize -1;
00208       ++taskBufferPrioritySize;
00209     }
00210     else
00211 #endif
00212       taskBufferInPointer = taskBufferOutPointer+taskBufferSize;
00213     taskBufferInPointer %= queueLength;
00214     taskBuffer[taskBufferInPointer] = taskID & 0x7F;
00215     ++taskBufferSize;
00216   }
00217   if (! isr)           // do not re-enable interrupts if calling from ISR
00218     asm("sei\n\t"::);
00219 }
00220 
00221 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00237 void nartos(void)
00238 {
00239   asm( "pop __tmp_reg__\n\t"
00240        "pop __tmp_reg__\n\t"
00241        "cli\n\t"::);
00242   while (taskBufferSize == 0);      // Loop and wait for something to happen
00243   uint8_t bufferPointer = taskBufferOutPointer;
00244 #ifdef PRIORITY_QUEUE
00245   if (taskBufferPrioritySize > 0)
00246   {
00247 // Take the high priority taskID from the queue
00248     if (taskBufferOutPointer == 0) taskBufferOutPointer = queueLength;
00249     bufferPointer = --taskBufferOutPointer;
00250     --taskBufferPrioritySize;
00251   }
00252 #endif
00253 // Take the taskID from the queue
00254   if (++taskBufferOutPointer >= queueLength) taskBufferOutPointer = 0;
00255   currentTaskID = taskBuffer[bufferPointer];
00256   uint16_t address = taskTable[currentTaskID];
00257   --taskBufferSize;
00258   asm( "push %0\n\t"
00259        "push %1\n\t"
00260        "reti\n\t"
00261        ::"r" ((uint8_t)(address&0xFF)),"r" ((uint8_t)(address>>8)&0xFF));
00262 }
